titleStmt.title: Fragments of Plato's Euthydemus (301 e9 - 302 c6, Ro)

General - Meta: add biblio 12817, p. 30. Text: Verso, ln. 1: delete [.?]--judging from the note in the ed. pr. it was unintended. Ln. 2: remove extra blank spaces and period after *pap*. Ln. 3: delete period and add *dipunct*. Ln 4: remove extra blank spaces and period after *pap*. Remove period and add *dipunct* after ἔφη. Ln. 6, 7, 9, 16, 17; Remove extra blank spaces and period after *pap*. Ln. 9 --> παιδαγωγὸς. Delete colon and add *dipunct*. Ln 10: delete period and add *dipunct*. Ln. 11: --> οὗτοί. Ln. 12 remove semicolon and add *dipunct*. Ln. 13: Remove period and add *dipunct*. Ln 17: remove period and add *dipunct*

General - Meta: add biblio 12817, p. 30. Text: Verso, ln. 1: delete [.?]--judging from the note in the ed. pr. it was unintended. Ln. 2: remove extra blank spaces and period after *pap*. Ln. 3: delete period and add *dipunct*. Ln 4: remove extra blank spaces and period after *pap*. Remove period and add *dipunct* after ἔφη. Ln. 6, 7, 9, 16, 17; Remove extra blank spaces and period after *pap*. Ln. 9 --> παιδαγωγὸς. Delete colon and add *dipunct*. Ln 10: delete period and add *dipunct*. Ln. 11: --> οὗτοί. Ln. 12 remove semicolon and add *dipunct*. Ln. 13: Remove period and add *dipunct*. Ln 17: remove period and add *dipunct*

General - Col. 2, ln. 12: add space after apostrophe in δ᾿. Ln. 13: add *dipunct* and delete period. Ln 14: remove extra blank spaces and period after *pap*. Ln 17: remove extra blank spaces and period after *pap*. Change colon to *dipunct* and remove period. Ln. 20: *middot* after ρε. Ln. 23: : remove extra blank spaces and period after *pap*. Ln. 24: add space after τ and remove extra blank spaces and period after *pap*. Ln. 28-29: <:ο̣[ὐκ ἔστι Ζεὺς ὁ πατρῳος;] ---- 29.- ο̣[ὐκ ἔστιν, ἦν δ᾿ ἐγώ]=Johnson, Papyrus Rolls, p. 30|ed|ο̣[ὐκ ἔστι Ζεὺς ὁ πατρῶι] ---- 29.- ο̣[ς]:>.

General - Col. 2, ln. 12: add space after apostrophe in δ᾿. Ln. 13: add *dipunct* and delete period. Ln 14: remove extra blank spaces and period after *pap*. Ln 17: remove extra blank spaces and period after *pap*. Change colon to *dipunct* and remove period. Ln. 20: *middot* after ρε. Ln. 23: : remove extra blank spaces and period after *pap*. Ln. 24: add space after τ and remove extra blank spaces and period after *pap*. Ln. 28-29: <:ο̣[ὐκ ἔστι Ζεὺς ὁ πατρῳος;] ---- 29.- ο̣[ὐκ ἔστιν, ἦν δ᾿ ἐγώ]=Johnson, Papyrus Rolls, p. 30|ed|ο̣[ὐκ ἔστι Ζεὺς ὁ πατρῶι] ---- 29.- ο̣[ς]:>.
General - Recto, col. 1. Text, l. 4: change semicolon to *middot*. Line 5: delete period after "pap" and extra blank spaces around pipes and equal signs. L. 6 and 10: add space after apostrophe.
General - Recto, col. 1. Text, l. 4: change semicolon to *middot*. Line 5: delete period after "pap" and extra blank spaces around pipes and equal signs. L. 6 and 10: add space after apostrophe.

General - Metadata: delete volume number in biblio 95236. Give two biblio entries for 68414, one for each Plato text. Biblio 95691: add pp. 248-256. Treat each keyword separately. TM Author id is 694. TLG Euthydemus. Add 2 columns. Explain in notes that recto preserves Euthydemus and verso Lysis. Change first value of date to 175.

General - Metadata: delete volume number in biblio 95236. Give two biblio entries for 68414, one for each Plato text. Biblio 95691: add pp. 248-256. Treat each keyword separately. TM Author id is 694. TLG Euthydemus. Add 2 columns. Explain in notes that recto preserves Euthydemus and verso Lysis. Change first value of date to 175.

Submit - I have digitised P. Oxy. 6 881 (TM 62631) following Grenfell and Hunt 1908. I integrated the apparatus with Burnet 1903 when additional relevant elements had been pointed out. I did not have the CPF study at my disposal. If you could please check whether the author depicts a paragraphos between ll. 16 and 17 (recto), I would be grateful. I revised the metadata.

Submit - I have digitised P. Oxy. 6 881 (TM 62631) following Grenfell and Hunt 1908. I integrated the apparatus with Burnet 1903 when additional relevant elements had been pointed out. I did not have the CPF study at my disposal. If you could please check whether the author depicts a paragraphos between ll. 16 and 17 (recto), I would be grateful. I revised the metadata.
